name: WangGuard Registration Notice Add-on
author: WangGuard

sections.description:
With this WangGuard Add-on, you can add a Notice in the registration page. It is compatible with WordPress, WordPress Multisite, BuddyPress and WooCommerce.

WangGuard plugin version 1.6+ is needed

Why use WangGuard Registration Nocice Add-on?

We have detected that many sploggers and spam users avoid website with WangGuard plugin, so Why don’t notice that you are using it?
sections.installation:
1. Download and install WangGuard Registration Nocice Add-on

  2. Activate plugins through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress (if is a Multisite, WangGuard needs to be activated for the Network)

  3. Updates are automatic. Click on “Upgrade Automatically” if prompted from the admin menu. If you ever have to manually upgrade, simply deactivate, uninstall, and repeat the installation steps with the new version.
sections.faq:
How to use it?

It’s easy, go to WangGuard -> WangGuard settings and add you Notice.
